Who is at risk for Omsk Hemorrhagic Fever (OHF)? ?,"Humans can become infected through tick bites or through contact with the blood, feces, or urine of an infected, sick, or dead animal â€“ most commonly, rodents. Occupational and recreational activities such as hunting or trapping may increase human risk of infection.
